features.name: Facebook Connector Registration
features.description: Core connector that registers Facebook as a social connector in Evoq, providing App ID and App Secret configuration keys.
test_scenarios: Verify connector appears in available connections list
Verify icon path is correctly resolved

features.name: Facebook App Configuration
features.description: Configure Facebook application credentials (App ID and App Secret) for authenticating with Facebook API.
test_scenarios: Configure valid App ID and App Secret
Test saving configuration to portal settings

features.name: Configuration Parameter Upgrade
features.description: Upgrades connector configuration parameter names from 'AppId/AppSecret' to 'App ID/App Secret' for version 08.01.00.
test_scenarios: Upgrade from pre-08.01.00 with old parameter names
Verify parameter names are updated correctly

features.name: Facebook Like Box Widget
features.description: Displays Facebook Like box allowing users to like pages directly from the Evoq site.
features.ui_location: Page Content > Social Share Modules > Facebook Like
test_scenarios: Add Facebook Like widget to page
Verify widget renders with Facebook SDK
Test widget with valid Facebook App ID
Test widget without App ID configuration

features.name: Facebook Comments Integration
features.description: Enables Facebook comments on Evoq pages, allowing users to comment using their Facebook accounts.
features.ui_location: Page Content > Social Share Modules > Facebook Comments
test_scenarios: Add Facebook Comments widget to page
Post a comment using Facebook account
Verify comments persist across page reloads
Test widget without App ID configuration

features.name: Facebook Facepile Widget
features.description: Displays profile photos of Facebook users who have liked the page or performed other social actions.
features.ui_location: Page Content > Social Share Modules > Facebook Facepile
test_scenarios: Add Facebook Facepile widget to page
Test with pages having multiple likes
Test with pages having no likes

features.name: Facebook Recommendations Widget
features.description: Displays personalized recommendations for pages on the site based on Facebook's algorithm.
features.ui_location: Page Content > Social Share Modules > Facebook Recommendations
test_scenarios: Add Facebook Recommendations widget to page
Verify widget renders with Facebook SDK
Test personalization based on user's Facebook activity

features.name: Facebook Send Button
features.description: Provides a button for users to privately send content to Facebook friends via Facebook Messenger.
features.ui_location: Page Content > Social Share Modules > Facebook Send Button
test_scenarios: Add Facebook Send Button to page
Click send button and verify Facebook dialog opens

features.name: Facebook Shared Activity Feed
features.description: Displays a feed of recent activity and interactions from Facebook users on the site.
features.ui_location: Page Content > Social Share Modules > Facebook Shared Activity
test_scenarios: Add Facebook Shared Activity widget to page

features.name: Facebook SDK Initialization
features.description: JavaScript SDK initialization that enables all Facebook widgets and social features on the site.
features.ui_location: Automatic on pages with Facebook widgets
test_scenarios: Verify SDK loads only once per page
Test SDK initialization with valid App ID
Test SDK initialization with invalid App ID
Verify SDK status and cookie settings
Verify XFBML parsing for Facebook tags
Test error handling in SDK initialization

features.name: Module Installation and Packaging
features.description: Installation package deployment and resource file extraction for the Facebook Connector module.
